articles.description: Dell XPS 13 was refreshed back in September with the latest Intel 11th Gen Tiger Lake CPUs and is now available in India. It comes in Core i5 and Core i7 models.
articles.content: Dell XPS 13 laptops with the latest Intel 11th Gen Tiger Lake CPUs are now on sale in India. The XPS 13 was refreshed with the latest processors back in September along with Dell XPS 13 2-in-1 but wa… [+2080 chars]

articles.author: Ali Pardiwala
articles.title: Mi QLED TV 4K With UHD, Dolby Vision Display Launched in India by Xiaomi: Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Mi QLED TV 4K has been launched in India, Xiaomi's first QLED tech television in the country, and its most premium offering yet for the market. The new Mi TV has a 55-inch Ultra-HD QLED screen, and is powered by Android TV and PatchWall.
articles.content: Mi QLED TV 4K - Xiaomi's first QLED panel TV in India - was launched on Wednesday. Sporting a 55-inch Ultra-HD screen, the Android TV and PatchWall-powered Mi QLED TV 4K is also the company's most pr… [+3003 chars]

articles.title: Oppo A15s unveiled in India with extra RAM, Storage and new colorways - Gizchina.com
articles.description: Oppo has unveiled the Oppo A15s two months after the Oppo A15 release in India. It brings more RAM, extra storage and adds two new colorways.
articles.content: A couple of months ago, Oppo unveiled the Oppo A15 in India as a solid budget contender for the competitive market. Recently, we’ve been coming across a plethora of rumors pointing to the launch of a… [+2341 chars]

articles.description: Samsung's 5nm chipset is expected to debut on the X60 in less than two weeks' time.
